c-0: ^ Could you tell me what happened at the night of the murder?
^Want my alibi? Unfortunately I was home last night.
^I'll just tell you that the old man had many enemies. This outcome doesn't surprise me.
^Everyone in this town was after his money.
c-1: ^   Can you tell me about Duke Whitmore?
^Great Duke Whitmore... what was so great about him anyway?
^I see, so  you two weren't close...
^Let's just say he had it coming.
c-2: ^ Can you tell me about this knife?
^Can you tell me about this knife?
^He only gives these knives to the people closest to him.
^What about you, do you have one?
^...You should be getting on with your investigation, Detective.
c-3: ^That's the Duke... my brother, as a child.
^Photo's ripped, but I think it was his childhood buddy next to him in that photo.
^I don't know much about him. That box looks familiar though.
